title: SBF files appeal seeking to reverse conviction over allegations of judicial bias
description: Sam Bankman-Fried (SBF), co-founder of the collapsed crypto exchange FTX, has filed an appeal challenging his fraud conviction on Sept. 13, arguing that the trial was tainted by judicial bias and procedural errors. The appeal, submitted to the Second Circuit Court of Appeals on Sept. 13, alleged unfairness during the legal proceedings that resulted in […]

title: Kraken Challenges SEC, Demands Jury Trial as Case Heats Up
description: The exchange has made a fresh demand to strengthen its defense against the regulatory commission.

title: Arbitrum dominates L2 TVL, but ARB’s price isn’t responding – Why?
description: Arbitrum holds the top spot in the Layer 2 ecosystem with the highest TVL, but ARB token holders face challenges.
